thread.title: You get what you pay for.
thread.title_full: You get what you pay for. - Review of Hotel ibis budget London City Airport, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: maxineh443
title: You get what you pay for.
text:
Supposed to be near to the Excel arena but it is at least a 15-20 minute walk over a bridge and route which is not really suitable for pedestrians. Also not suitable to walk from the DLR with heavy luggage. Manager is rude, bombastuc and has an overrated image of himself and the 'hostel' he runs.
Room Tip: The third bed in the triple room is like a cot- no good for an adult. Take a cordless hair applianc... See more room tips
